title: 启动器启动失败
author: Casper2017
txt_content:
如题，启动器启动1.13.2失败。
错误代码：
Completely ignored arguments: [--tweakClass, org.dimdev.riftloader.launch.RiftLoaderClientTweaker]
Exception in thread "main" joptsimple.MultipleArgumentsForOptionException: Found multiple arguments for option version, but you asked for only one
        at joptsimple.OptionSet.valueOf(OptionSet.java:179)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.a(SourceFile:149)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:105)

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
重新装一次rift
或者使用已整合过的
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-837924-1-6.html?tdsourcetag=s_pcqq_aiomsg

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
不知道你是不是使用hmcl启动器，请尝试更新hmcl并更新游戏资源文件
最新版可以在这里下载：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=142335&page=1&authorid=2605643

replies.author: Casper2017
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-3-21 07:13
重新装一次rift
或者使用已整合过的
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-837924-1-6.html?tdsourcetag=s_pcqq_ai ...
感谢，已解决

replies.txt_content:
